amendment.description: Amendment requires the Office of Children's Affairs to develop a plan for providing independent legal counsel for unaccompanied alien children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House report 107-419 to require the Office of Children's Affairs, within the Office of Immigration Affairs, develop a plan, to be brought before Congress on how to ensure that unaccompanied alien children are appointed independent legal counsel, consistent with current law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baldwin amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
